When Wildfire Cerberus becomes monstrous, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and each creature your opponents control.

mc.name: Worst Fears
mc.oracleText: You control target player during that player's next turn. Exile Worst Fears. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)
